Description: Up for grabs is a Floyd Rose brand guitar in a dark/deep blue, with the SpeedLoader bridge. Awesome way of making the string changes really, really fast. Has its share of scratches and dings, mostly on the body, the neck is rather smooth--it's no showcase guitar, but a good player! Note that this is also the SpeedLoader version with the tremelo (no bar included, but it takes the standard kind); most models seen around are the much less exciting hardtail versions. This one also has an adjustable block installed by the previous owner in the spring cavity, making it easier to tune. The only reason I'm selling is I had a recent elbow surgery, and that makes it difficult to play; so this guitar should be enjoyed by someone who will use it much more. The original neck pickup had an output problem and was nearly silent, so both pickups were swapped for Guitar Madness G.M. Hexbuckers which sound great, and they still have the original plastic covering on them. Feel free to ask any questions! FREE SHIPPING to the lower 48 states!A hardcase is also available for this guitar for an additional $60, or a soft gig bag for $10--let me know before paying and I'll include it. Either way, this guitar will be packaged extremely securely for battle! ------------------------------------------------------- If you use 'Buy It Now'- please place payment immediately in order to secure the item. Shipping and Handling: Item will be posted ASAP after auction end--more often than not sooner, but 2 days is the maximum handling time . Insurance: Insurance is your option (unless included and specified otherwise in the auction)-; I am not responsible for any damage to the item(s) incurred during shipping. If you want to insure the item(s) - I will do so for an additional charge based on the final Auction Value. Combined Shipping: If bidding on multiple items, please note that I will discount each additional item as much as possible! Refunds/Returns: I will accept returns for (non As Is) items that are non-functioning on arrival - if the Buyer notifies me via e-mail within 3 days of the problem and ships the Item back within 10 days. If the Item is truly non-functional, I will refund the Auction Final Value (minus any shipping). If the Item is working properly, I will not refund the Auction, the item must be returned to the buyer. Any returned Items must be received in the original packaging, must pay return shipping; serial numbers are recorded and checked. As Is Auctions: Any item(s) sold As Is is not subject to return for any reason. It is advertised/sold As Is;- I attempt to list all items with full descriptions of any functional issues and all known details. I reserve the right to cancel winning bids from: § Bidders with less than 5 Feedback and/or 99% rating § International Bidders § Recently changed Ebay IDs (Less than 30 days) Dont let this deal get away! Thanks for looking and Happy Bidding!
